```{=html}
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  // ===== BOT√ìN C√ìDIGO GLOBAL =====
  const btn = document.createElement('button');
  btn.id = 'global-code-toggle';
  btn.textContent = 'üíª C√≥digo Oculto';
  document.body.appendChild(btn);
  
  let codeVisible = true;
  btn.addEventListener('click', function() {
    const codes = document.querySelectorAll('pre');
    codeVisible = !codeVisible;
    codes.forEach(code => {
      code.style.display = codeVisible ? 'block' : 'none';
    });
    btn.textContent = codeVisible ? 'üíª C√≥digo Oculto' : 'üëÅÔ∏è Mostrar C√≥digo';
  });
  
  // ===== MINI-TOC DERECHO DIN√ÅMICO =====
  const rightToc = document.createElement('nav');
  rightToc.id = 'right-toc';
  
  const rightTitle = document.createElement('div');
  rightTitle.id = 'right-toc-title';
  rightTitle.textContent = 'üìç Secci√≥n actual';
  
  const rightList = document.createElement('ul');
  rightList.id = 'right-toc-list';
  
  rightToc.appendChild(rightTitle);
  rightToc.appendChild(rightList);
  document.body.appendChild(rightToc);
  
  // Funci√≥n para actualizar subsecciones de h2 actual
  function updateSubsections() {
    const h1s = document.querySelectorAll('h1');
    const rightList = document.getElementById('right-toc-list');
    const rightTitle = document.getElementById('right-toc-title');
    
    h1s.forEach((h1, index) => {
      // Obtener siguiente h1 o final del documento
      const nextH1 = h1s[index + 1];
      const range = document.createRange();
      range.setStart(h1, 0);
      range.setEnd(nextH1 || document.body, nextH1 ? 0 : 1);
      
      const h2sInRange = range.commonAncestorContainer.querySelectorAll('h2');
      
      // Detectar si estamos en esta secci√≥n
      const rect = h1.getBoundingClientRect();
      if (rect.top < window.innerHeight && rect.bottom > 0) {
        rightTitle.textContent = `üìç ${h1.textContent}`;
        
        // Limpiar y llenar con h2s de esta secci√≥n
        rightList.innerHTML = '';
        
        let currentH2 = h1.nextElementSibling;
        while (currentH2 && currentH2.tagName !== 'H1') {
          if (currentH2.tagName === 'H2') {
            if (!currentH2.id) currentH2.id = `h2-${Math.random().toString(36).substr(2, 9)}`;
            
            const li = document.createElement('li');
            const a = document.createElement('a');
            a.href = `#${currentH2.id}`;
            a.textContent = currentH2.textContent;
            a.style.fontSize = '0.9em';
            a.style.fontWeight = '500';
            
            li.appendChild(a);
            rightList.appendChild(li);
          }
          currentH2 = currentH2.nextElementSibling;
        }
      }
    });
  }
  
  // Actualizar al scroll
  window.addEventListener('scroll', updateSubsections);
  window.addEventListener('load', updateSubsections);
  
  // Marcar enlace activo en mini-TOC
  window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
    const h2s = document.querySelectorAll('h2');
    const links = document.querySelectorAll('#right-toc-list a');
    
    h2s.forEach((h2) => {
      const rect = h2.getBoundingClientRect();
      links.forEach(link => {
        if (link.href.endsWith(`#${h2.id}`) && rect.top < 150 && rect.bottom > 0) {
          links.forEach(l => l.classList.remove('active-section'));
          link.classList.add('active-section');
        }
      });
    });
  });
});
</script>
```
